price: Ka ce: "Lalle, Ubangijĩna Yanã shimfiɗa arziki ga wanda Ya so, kuma Yanã ƙuntatãwa, kuma amma mafi yawan mutãne ba su sani ba."
arabic: قُلۡ إِنَّ رَبِّي يَبۡسُطُ ٱلرِّزۡقَ لِمَن يَشَآءُ وَيَقۡدِرُ وَلَٰكِنَّ أَكۡثَرَ ٱلنَّاسِ لَا يَعۡلَمُونَ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: qul inna rabbī yabsuṭu al-riz'qa liman yashāu wayaqdiru walākinna akthara al-nāsi lā yaʿlamūna
